name: mongodb-data-generator
description: Generate large datasets for MongoDB performance practice

scripts.ecommerce:small: TOTAL_USERS=10000 TOTAL_PRODUCTS=500 TOTAL_ORDERS=5000 TOTAL_REVIEWS=2000 node generate-ecommerce.js
scripts.ecommerce:medium: TOTAL_USERS=100000 TOTAL_PRODUCTS=5000 TOTAL_ORDERS=50000 TOTAL_REVIEWS=20000 node generate-ecommerce.js
scripts.ecommerce:large: TOTAL_USERS=1000000 TOTAL_PRODUCTS=10000 TOTAL_ORDERS=500000 TOTAL_REVIEWS=200000 node generate-ecommerce.js
scripts.ecommerce:xlarge: TOTAL_USERS=5000000 TOTAL_PRODUCTS=50000 TOTAL_ORDERS=2000000 TOTAL_REVIEWS=1000000 node generate-ecommerce.js
